 2010-00282010-01-14LAB,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Labour Code
PrecisReappointment of NORMAND RIVARD of Orleans, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Canada Industrial Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years; and order that NORMAND RIVARD be deemed to be employed in the Public Service for the purposes of the Public Service Superannuation Act, effective January 15, 2010.
